dm:bugtracker.dm:product: SAP Data Intelligence 3.1 on Rancher Kubernetes Engine 1

abstract.para: SAP Data Intelligence 3 is the tool set to govern big amount of data. Rancher Kubernetes Engine (RKE) 1 is the Kubernetes base that makes deploying SAP Data Intelligence 3 easy.
This document describes the installation and configuration of RKE 1 from SUSE and SAP Data Intelligence 3.
